enchantment.curses_and_cryptics.immutabi: Prevents additional enchantments from being added to this item
enchantment.curses_and_cryptics.obscurin: Hides this item's enchantment and attribute lists
enchantment.curses_and_cryptics.instabil: Makes this item have a chance of breaking when enchantments are added to it
enchantment.curses_and_cryptics.miasma_c: Increase the radius at which mobs can sense you
enchantment.curses_and_cryptics.misappro: Prevents the Misappropriation Sigil from being used on this item again
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.obscuri: Obtain an item with Curse of Obscuring.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.quixoti: Obtain an item with Curse of Quixotism.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.misappr: Use the Misappropriation Sigil to reset an item's repair cost.
Obtain an item with Curse of Miasma.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.anvil_r: Repair an anvil using an Iron Block.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.whetsto: Now you can finally grind off all of those curses.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.instabi: Obtain an item with Curse of Instability.
advancements.curses_and_cryptics.immutab: Obtain an item with Curse of Immutability.
jei.hint.curses_and_cryptics.misappropri: With its prior work cost reset
jei.info.curses_and_cryptics.cryptic_enc: Can be combined with an enchantable item in an anvil to enchant it randomly at that level, including treasure enchantments and curses.
jei.info.curses_and_cryptics.misappropri: Can be combined with an item in an anvil to reset its prior work cost.
jei.info.curses_and_cryptics.enchanted_b: Can be combined with a cursed item in a grindstone to remove all curses from it.
jei.info.curses_and_cryptics.blessed_whe: Can be combined with an enchanted item in a grindstone to remove a random enchantment from it. Can remove curses.
jei.info.curses_and_cryptics.whetstone: Can be combined with an enchanted item in a grindstone to remove a random enchantment from it. Cannot remove curses.
